description: Gladiator (Melvin Potter) is a fictional character, a reformed supervillain in the Marvel Comics Universe.Potter was one of the first enemies of the superhero Daredevil. In civilian life, he is a costume-designer at the Spotlight Costume Shop in New York City. He eventually reformed and became one of the staunchest supporters of Daredevil.
name: Gladiator (Kallark)
